discrepancies.finding: Invoice does not indicate the name of the beneficiary or the second beneficiary
Invoice does not indicate the description of the goods, services or performance
Invoice does not include additional charges and costs within the value shown against the stated trade term
Invoice does not indicate the total quantity of goods and their weight or measurement

compliances.finding: Insurance document is presented and indicates the insurance cover
Invoice is presented in the required format and includes the necessary details
Invoice includes the description of the goods, services or performance
Invoice includes the total quantity of goods and their weight or measurement
